text:
Ok I understand a bit more now! 

Glad to hear you enjoy it as that is the most important thing, there is no point in doing something you hate or dread going to each day.

Have you had a chance to look at the career plan document? I think it would be a good idea to have a look when you have a chance, even if you don't think you can fill all of it in it might help work out the things you don't want to do, which is just as important as what you do want to do.

But if you have any general queries just let me know and I will do my best to answer / give you some insight.
